briefDescription: A full-stack fitness website with a modern UI, user authentication, and gym management features. It allows users to book gym sessions, view trainers, and manage their profile.
challengesFaced: Designing a user-friendly dashboard and booking system.
Ensuring a smooth and responsive user interface across devices.
potentialImprovements: Add payment gateway integration for booking gym sessions.
Add real-time notifications for gym schedules.
Enhance the mobile experience with further optimizations.

briefDescription: A hotel booking platform that allows users to search for hotels, check availability, and book rooms online. It includes user authentication and booking management functionality.
challengesFaced: Integrating booking functionality with backend APIs.
Handling asynchronous data fetching for hotel listings and bookings.
Designing an intuitive UI for users to navigate and book rooms.
potentialImprovements: Add payment gateway integration for booking reservations.
Implement a review and rating system for hotels.
Optimize search and filtering capabilities for better user experience.

briefDescription: Visa Navigator is a platform that helps users find and apply for visas by providing detailed information about the visa application process and requirements for different countries.
challengesFaced: Gathering and managing visa information for multiple countries.
Designing an efficient and user-friendly search and filter functionality.
Ensuring data accuracy and timely updates of visa information.
potentialImprovements: Integrate visa status tracking and updates for users.
Add a feature to save and compare visa requirements for different countries.
Include an API for real-time visa application status updates.
